Text: Do they really speak French in this movie? My connection is pretty slow so it's better if I ask before I download it.

Very nice movie with superstar Jackie starring. Nice plot and choreography. In this movie Jackie Chan is the witness of his father's death by the skilled hands of a martial arts master with an unknown killing technique. Jackie vows to become a Shaolin monk and avenge his death, but soon finds that he's the chump of the class. After befriending a variety of shaolin masters, each of whom teach Jackie a particular style of kung fu (drunken, etc.), Jackie suddenly finds himself good enough to go give the beats to the 100 "wooden men" whom all shaolin (in this flick anyways) have to beat to get the funky haircut. Jackie then proceeds to go around laying the beats on everyone, but shows his compassion and humility at the end..For more information go to wing-chunws/Shaolin%20Wooden%20Men.html
